description: attempt to rid the world of unemployment
overview:
Tischen.com, an online directory of skilled people, was launched in 2010 with a mission to rid the world of unemployment.

Tischenâ€™s sole purpose is to get people job requests, allowing them to showcase their skills and work samples, share their availability, and communicate quickly by e-mail or text. Tischenâ€™s platform can help full-timers, freelancers, moonlighters, odd-job doers, self-reinventors, and anyone with a hidden talent they wish to be paid for.

Current members include Lawyers, Painters, Babysitters, Bakers, Photographers, Tutors, Typists, Copywriters, DJâ€™s, Plumbers, Party Planners, Programmers, Artists and Actors.

The name Tischen is derived from “Tisch” â€“ the German word for table â€“ a symbol of craftsmanship and human ingenuity, and a place of coming together to solve problems cooperatively.
